timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -46,7 +50,11 @@
 
     MILE("mi_us", 8 * 40 * 16.5),
     MILE_CI("MI_US", 8 * 40 * 16.5),

+    MILE_VARIANT_MIS("mis", 8 * 40 * 16.5),
+    MILE_VARIANT_MILE("mile", 8 * 40 * 16.5),
+    MILE_VARIANT_MILES("miles", 8 * 40 * 16.5),

+    FOOT_VARIANT_FEET("feet", 1.0),
